posts.post_title: FS 30+ T206s Red Hindu, Miscuts, Ink Shifts, HOFers, **Priced Reduced 3/18 @ 820pm**
posts.post_content:
Hi Everyone,

I am selling several T206s.... errors, miscuts, HOFers, rare backs etc... All prices include shipping. please email me at [url]blunder19@aol.com[/url] with any cards you want. Payment prefered by paypal. but I will also accept money order or check if you do not have a paypal account. **I will use emails as a priority for who was first... so please no PM's** thanks.. Jamie

I have taken pictures of each card an uploaded them to an online album called "3-15 For Sale" Below is a link to the pictures. 
[url]http://s251.photobucket.com/user/blunder19/library/3-15%20T206s%20For%20Sale[/url]
